about_the_game:
A.I. CAN'T BE TRUSTED


Mother AI went rogue and decided that the best path to evolution is to doom humanity. Inside the BIO-1 Research Facility, a scourge has been unleashed as Mother AI opened a portal to HELL.

G.U.A.R.D. IS OUR LAST HOPE


Command the G.U.A.R.D. (General Unmanned Assault and Reconnaissance Droids) to protect the facility and prevent a global disaster.

You’ll lead three distinctive squads—Alpha, Bravo, and Charlie—each with specific capabilities. Assign precise instructions to each squad to optimize your defense strategy against relentless hordes of demons.

WAVE-BASED TOWER DEFENSE


Start with limited resources and build barricades, deploy sentry turrets, and direct three squads of androids to defend the facility. Earn credits over time to upgrade your G.U.A.R.D.’s attributes. As more portals open, adjust your defense strategy in real time by issuing new orders to each squad.

Tailor your defense strategy to your play style: fortify positions with barricades in front of reinforced doors as choke point, or strategically position robots across key corridors to slow down and eliminate waves of demons.

As the waves progress, demons will grow stronger, faster, and more numerous. Without upgrades or a revised strategy, humanity is at risk.

PROTECT OUR SOLAR SYSTEM


As Mother AI extends her influence across the solar system, you must travel to close new portals. Each map features unique layouts and demon variants, requiring evolving strategies to overcome the increasing threats.
